<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Crashing Wave](/Spells.aspx?ID=1984)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 243 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
